action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Dental Care for Low-Income Veterans Act
This bill expands eligibility for Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) outpatient dental services and treatment to low-income veterans. Currently, only certain veterans, including those suffering from service-connected issues, are eligible for dental services through the VA.
